title: ADDIE+UDL Integrated Instructional Design for [Large-Scale] Online English Literature Education

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level English grammar and foundational literary analysis skills
context.additional_context: A self-directed learning course aimed at improving advanced literary analysis skills in online environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the structure, themes, and literary devices of English literary works with 80% accuracy through activities designed according to the ADDIE+UDL model on an online platform
Learners can comparatively explain at least three cultural contexts of literary works using multiple representation materials (text/audio/visual) based on UDL principles
Learners can write literary criticism essays according to academic standards through summative evaluation in the evaluation phase of the ADDIE model
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
